channel.title: OleanPkz! 100% Pking System, Minigames, Training, Bosses--!STAFF NEEDED!
channel.description:
Thread in developement teams:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,518025.0.html
[center]OleanPkz 24/7 RSPS [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/5ygs9t.jpg[/img] OleanPkz is a 317 DELTA based off of Edge4Pk. 10% Credit to SOLE creator of Edge4Pk. 10% to SWAT for his client. 80% to the OleanPkz Management Team (2 members)
We are in need of members of our management team. [b]We need: A web client coder, regular RSPS staff members, and anyone who has spent more than 100 hours coding JAVA.[/b] [url=http://uppit.com/17t3tns32o2r/OleanPkz_Staff_Application.txt]Click here to apply![/url]
OleanPkz RSPS 100% Pking and pking shops. 1 Kill = 1 Pk point. 100% Online points with Online Point Shop (Trade in online points for items, here you can purchase a donator ticket if your Online time exceeds > 168 hours of Online Time. 100% Skillcape emotes! 90% Barrows (Just hills with npc's inside.) 100% Cave (Dragons, God Wars)
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/28lyujl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/orno75.png[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/21ct5ar.png[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2h2dpj5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/30xh7x1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/4v3khl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2v34g2v.png[/img] [b]More pictures to come soon... [/b]
[b]Donator Benefits:[/b] Donator Symbol. Donator Teleport. Donator-Only areas like.. Donator bosses, Donator Barrows, Donator Dragons. Donator-Only Items & Shop. Donators can do ::yell.
More information to come soon..
For questions/comments please email our Management Team at: management.oleanpkz@live.com
[b] Requesting permission from a staff member to list my link below:[/b] * [b]Forum:[/b] [url=http://oleanpk.tk]OleanPkz Forum[/url] * [/center]

[center]OleanPkz 24/7 RSPS

5ygs9t.jpg788×326

OleanPkz is a 317 DELTA based off of Edge4Pk.
10% Credit to SOLE creator of Edge4Pk.
10% to SWAT for his client.
80% to the OleanPkz Management Team (2 members)

We are in need of members of our management team.
We need:
A web client coder, regular RSPS staff members, and anyone who has spent more than 100 hours coding JAVA.
Click here to apply!

OleanPkz RSPS
100% Pking and pking shops.
1 Kill = 1 Pk point.
100% Online points with Online Point Shop (Trade in online points for items, here you can purchase a donator ticket if your Online time exceeds > 168 hours of Online Time.
100% Skillcape emotes!
90% Barrows (Just hills with npc’s inside.)
100% Cave (Dragons, God Wars)

28lyujl.png781×534

orno75.png765×500






More pictures to come soon…

Donator Benefits:
Donator Symbol.
Donator Teleport.
Donator-Only areas like…
Donator bosses, Donator Barrows, Donator Dragons.
Donator-Only Items & Shop.
Donators can do ::yell.

More information to come soon…
